title.rendered: “IDF Announces Siren Sound Tests Today: Key Times and Areas to Know”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Sound tests of the Home Front Command’s sirens will take place today (Tuesday) in the Yanuh-Jat area in the North district and in the areas of Ramatim, Ashalim, Mish’abe Shedda, and the Merhavim area in the South district.

Sound tests of the Home Front Command’s sirens will take place today (Tuesday) at 09:35 in Yanuh-Jat, at 10:05 in Ramatim, at 11:05 in Mish’abe Shedda, at 11:45 in Ashalim, and at 12:25 in the Merhavim area.

If a real alert is activated, an additional ascending and descending siren will be heard.
At the same time, an alert will also be distributed via the Home Front Command app and through supplementary warning means.

Additional information can be found at the Home Front Command call center at 104, via WhatsApp messages at 052-9104104, on the national portal at: oref.org.il, and on social media.
